amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more that 50 employees from a Federal Department or Agency at any single conference occuring outside the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more that 50 employees from a Federal Department or Agency at any single conference occuring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
